column2: *Some creature's fat face appears on the screen. It has a lot of teeth, scaly skin, and it grunts a bit when it breathes.* YOU! Who're you?!
Uhm…
*The creature grunts again and speaks more loudly, shouting by the time it finishes the sentence.* YOU! BORK IS TALKING TO YOU, YOU ARE TALKING TO BORK! WHO'RE YOU?! MY TURF! MY SPOT!
All right, let's start with this. This is the Aurora 2, my ship. You are blocking my home planet. What gives?

*The creature grunts and speaks just a little more quietly. You can hear roaring in the background: those must be his clansmen.* Hrrraka. This is my ship. Its name is "The Ship!" It's good! It's powerful! The Ship is the best ship a Bork has ever had!
What are you doing here?

Don't interrupt the Bork!! I was talking!! What was I talking about?!! The Ship. The Ship is a ship. I took it from the Klisks. Hrrraka is a smart Bork. I want to rob Klisks again. But I don't have a free spot. They're all taken by others, and they have good, powerful ships too. The Ship is better, but there's only one, and they have many. And I found a new planet! Hrrraka will rob Klisks here!! Klisks are rich! Many Borks came with Hrrraka!
If you came to rob the Klisks, why do you bother with other ships? They don't even have hyperdrives!
What if they're Klisks?!
The Klisks don't even trade with Earth. Not yet, anyway.
Lies! Hrrraka can't be fooled! Klisks trade with everyone!
No they don't.
They do!
Not with Earth.
They do!
No!
Yes!!
No!!
Yes!!!
No!!
Yes!
No!
Yes!!
No!
Yes!
Hrrraka, I could blow your scrap heap to pieces, do you understand that?
No!!
God damn it, it's like arguing with a child. What kind of goods do you need?
Ufff, I have to get some rest from you.
Ha! Hrrraka take your ship! Hrrraka name her The Ship 2! The Ship 2!!!
I wonder if you're all that dumb.
Oh-ha! *Apparently, Hrrraka is laughing.* Good argument! Intelligent! You're good, even though you're not Bork!
Glad to hear it. Maybe you can get your ships away from my planet?
Hurr. *He thinks.* You're good. But I want to rob. I need a spot. All of them are taken. And smart Borks won't give Hrrraka a spot.
So if I go to the smart Borks and ask for a spot for you, you'll go away?

Smart Borks won't give you a spot. You can't fool them. I tried! Hrrraka is smart Bork! But the smart ones are smarter than smart Hrrraka, even though Hrrraka smart. But the smart are still smarter than smart Hrrraka!! Arrrr!! Smart!!!
Right. Hey, what's that behind you?
Arrrr?!! *Hrrraka turns around and pants loudly.*
If they're all like that, I'll come back to you with good news. I have to go. Don't bother turning back around.
Hrrraka isn't a child! Hrrraka adult!
Okay, okay. What kind of goods do you need?
*Judging from the computer's suspicious beeping and Hrrraka's actions, you realize that he's trying to send you some files.* Why? You want find the goods for me?!
I think I do. I have to lift your stupid blockade somehow. I got your list.
You know what… NO!
